body.raw:
{
    "title": "JavaScript: The Good Parts",
    "author": "Douglas Crockford",
    "description": "A deep dive into the core features of JavaScript, focusing on the language's strengths and best practices. This book highlights the 'good parts' of JavaScript that developers should use to write more efficient and reliable code.",
    "published_at": "2008-05-15",
    "category_id": 1
}
